scenario_text.value: Hey, Kaito. What’s up?

Not planning to say goodbye? They did take
care of Miu for a while. I think you should.

I’ll let Miu say her own goodbyes. I wanted
to take some time to think about things.
Like what?

Doesn’t it feel to you like we’ve all come a
long way since Miu was queen here?

It’s funny, this world is so small, but I
can’t help but feel like we’ve journeyed far.

Hey, isn’t it a bit early to be getting all
sentimental on me?

Oh, shut up! Now’s as good a time as any.
Takuma, what do you think?

(I think I know what Kaito’s saying. The time
we’ve spent here has been so jam-packed.)

(But isn’t this the type of conversation they
have in movies before a character dies?!)

(All joking aside, we still have a long road
ahead of us. Hope they don’t lose focus.)
(What should I say to Kaito?)
I know how you feel.
A long road ahead.
Oh no, foreshadowing!

I kind of get how you feel, Kaito. We haven’t
been here all that long...

...and it still feels like forever since we
first came to this world.

Exactly. Anyway, I’m sure things will stay
tough, but let’s not let that stop us!
Yeah, all together, we’ve got this!

I get what you’re saying, but we’re not
exactly at the finish line, here.

The way things are going, we may not even be
halfway through our journey.
So don’t let your mind wander, okay?

Ah, whoops! That sounded harsher than I meant
it to sound...

I feel you. Don’t worry, just got a bit
schmaltzy there. My eyes are on the prize.

I’ll protect Miu, and help keep all of you
out of harm’s way.

Y’know man, talk like this is foreshadowing
before someone dies in the movies...
Seriously...?
What’s “four shadowing”?

Beats me. Maybe they’re so fat, they have
four shadows instead of just one?

Don’t go making lame jokes like Minoru, man.
If you get started there’ll be no end to it.
Haha, my bad...

I’m begging ya for real, here. We’ve prolly
got a huge fight ahead of us, yeah?

Heh, you’re sounding more like a big brother
than ever, Kaito.

What? I’ve been a big brother from the start!
You’re going to drive me crazy.

(Sounds like even Kaito can sense how much
we’ve all changed.)

Right, I’m gonna take a look around here.
I’ll give you a shout if I need anything.
